<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pitborn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1383) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your blood bears the mark of a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28), a living embodiment of sin from the fetid depths of the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13). Demonic power pulses through your veins and manifests in a different way for each pitborn, whether you have webbed fingers and thrive in the water, large hands capable of wrestling larger foes, or some other manifestation. You are trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3). If you were already trained in Athletics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 You also gain any one common 1st-level skill feat with a prerequisite of trained in Athletics, as reflects the manifestation of your Abyssal blood.

<title level="2">Pitborn leads to...</title>
[Demon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1388)
name: Pitborn
